attributes.action: Restrict HGV vehicles to the inside lane only on motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Restrict all HGV vehicles over 7 tonnes gross weight to the inside lane on all motorways with no overtaking except in designated area's and under specific conditions. This is to open motorways to the majority of users and reduce accidents.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
